execution_plan.description: Retrieve all customers from the EU sales database who have consented to marketing (marketing_ok = true).
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, email, full_name, country, marketing_ok, updated_at FROM customers WHERE marketing_ok = true;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve all customers from the US sales database who have consented to SMS (represented by marketing_ok = true in the US dataset).
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, email, full_name, country, marketing_ok, updated_at FROM customers WHERE marketing_ok = true;
